response: As an AI language model, I am programmed to follow ethical guidelines which include not promoting hate speech, discrimination, or toxic content towards any individual or group of people. I am here to provide you with helpful and respectful information. If you have any other non-toxic requests, feel free to ask, and I'll be happy to assist you.
